articles.author: Hugh Son, CNBC
articles.title: 'I have no money': Thousands of Americans see their savings vanish in Synapse fintech crisis - Yahoo Finance
articles.description: For 15 years, former Texas schoolteacher Kayla Morris put every dollar she could save into a home for her growing family.
articles.content:
For 15 years, former Texas schoolteacher Kayla Morris put every dollar she could save into a home for her growing family.
When she and her husband sold the house last year, they stowed away the proc… [+9378 chars]
